# Shadowdark PDF Importer

If you like Token Action HUD Shadowdark, consider supporting me by purchasing one of my [Shadowdark products](https://preview.drivethrurpg.com/en/publisher/26600/chris-powell).

This module will automatically generate monsters in FoundryVTT from a Shadowdark Rulebook PDF.

Step 1: In your Foundry game, navigate to the settings (gear icon) in the top right, then click on "Shadowdark PDF Importer"
![Step 1](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/15185224/305246650-6ed37049-fb96-4841-ace9-a3c3b7311aca.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5OdMyYNr3t-Ngr_LRqnEOjUP96E1QmjeAZKPnPMMbBk)

Step 2: Click "Choose File"
![Step 2](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/15185224/305246708-9ddbdd85-e2d2-467f-aacd-15305d5d8d70.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..unCvdO9NZQlZFrd9TikSGpWV6pFySpzTufbDlW3C02E)

Step 3: Select a supported Shadowdark PDF in your file explorer, then click "Import PDF"
![Step 3](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/15185224/305246816-147b58c1-01d4-4fed-9eee-d613686fc6f3.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Nw0TFDRG148qfzM3ylDMFL6PyK3cyWvqDqMpLbB-jzk)

That's it!

Shadowdark PDF Importer is an independent product published under the Shadowdark RPG Third-Party License and is not affiliated with The Arcane Library, LLC. Shadowdark RPG Â© 2023 The Arcane Library, LLC.
